Class DrawingSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • DrawingSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants
    public class DrawingSurface
extends processing.core.PApplet
    Represents every object that is drawn on the PApplet, and also handles certain interactions between players and enemies/bases
    Author:
    Nihal Ernest, Fabio Eirea, and Krishan Patel
